sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../../components/Navbar"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Orders = () => { const [writingDirection, setWritingDirection] = useState("ltr"); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [orders, setOrders] = useState([]); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { document.title = "Orders - Khamco Shop"; }, []); return ( <>
New Order

{message}

All Orders

{orders.length > 0 ? ( orders.map((order, index) => (

Customer Name:{" "} {`${order.customer_name} ${order.customer_surname}`}

{order.order_start_time && (

Order Start Date:{" "} {order.order_start_time.toLocaleDateString("en-us", { month: "numeric", year: "numeric", day: "numeric", })}

)}

Order Status:{" "} {order.order_status}

View
)) ) : (

No orders available.

)}
); }; export default Orders;
